Message:
One day, I received a letter
from the younger sister.

I was thrilled to receive another
letter from my best friend,

but the moment I started
reading, my face froze.

The letter said that the Church
had captured her older sister...

“I’m the one that’s the witch,
so why is Big Sis the one
that has to be captured?”

So said the letter,
but I knew why.

For that was the choice
the older sister made to
save her younger sister.

And that choice now left
the younger sister alone
and in despair.
